root: ^Hmm... I saw this place finally opened back up, huh?

^The menu's a lot more limited than the last time I was here, but I guess that's to be expected, what with all the shutdowns since Ol' Jim was running the cafe. Maybe the Mayor's initiative will bring in some new suppliers, eh?
^Alright, well... can I just have something straightforward? But nothing with coffee - can't stand the bitterness.
